Description:
Contacts budget holders in order to get approval for invoices.
Utilization of SAP sub ledger for processing of invoices of all shared service center entities.
Verify and manage the requests involving change of vendor names and addresses.
Evaluate the authenticity of the changes in vendor name and addresses and execute them.Salary: AED 5000 - AED 5500Skills
Skills:
Experience with general ledger functions and the month-end/year-end close process.
Exhibits a strong grasp of financial knowledge, that involves financial accounting, reporting, planning, treasury, and investment.
Organizational ability to build and maintain structure and discipline within an organization.
Expertise in financial accounting, reporting, planning, controlling and assurance and investment.
